entries.error: Missing finally blocks in tool execution error handlers. Tool callbacks may create resources (file handles, connections, memory buffers) that aren't cleaned up when exceptions occur in node_processor.py and tool_executor.py.
entries.solution: Added finally blocks to all try/except blocks in tool execution paths. Ensures resource cleanup logging and cleanup code execution regardless of success or failure. Applied to node_processor.py:495-512 and tool_executor.py:31-36.
